PATIENT_ID: TEST_ROTEM_003
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-20 22:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-01-20 22:10:00
Category I activation for 32-year-old male, stab wound to left flank.
Hemodynamically unstable. BP 78/50, HR 128, RR 26.
Massive Transfusion Protocol activated. ED blood box opened.
Balanced blood resuscitation initiated.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-20 22:40:00
Patient taken to OR for exploratory laparotomy.
Splenic laceration repaired. Bleeding controlled intraoperatively.
No ROTEM panel ordered during resuscitation.
No ROTEM parameters documented.
